channel.title: Bitcoin Design on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Bitcoin Design on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Bitcoin Core Gui (2020-08-20)
item.description: Name: Bitcoin Core GUI introductory meeting Topic: Agenda link posted below Location: Bitcoin Design (online) Date: August 20th 2020 Video: No video posted online Agenda: https://github.com/BitcoinDesign/Meta/issues/8 The conversation has been anonymized by default to protect the identities of the participants. Those who have expressed a preference for their comments to be attributed are attributed. If you were a participant and would like your comments to be attributed please get in touch.
